original_text: You built places to worship your idols on every street. You offered yourself to people, like a prostitute. But you did not want them to pay you anything, as a prostitute would do.
korean_text: 네가 누각을 모든 길 어귀에 건축하며 높은 대를 모든 거리에 쌓고도 값을 싫어하니 창기 같지도 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: You built places to worship your idols
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 우상들을 숭배할 장소를 지었고

sentences.original_text: But you did not want them to pay you anything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그들이 너에게 아무것도 지불하기를 원치 않았으며
